So spiritual is the character of God's work upon the 

                                                    15 

human heart that receives it that it makes every one a new creature without destroying or weakening any capability God has given to man. It purifies every attribute fit for connection with the divine nature. That which is born of the Spirit is Spirit, and when man is born from above, a heavenly peace pervades the soul.--MS 1, 1897. (SpTBC [No. 3] 8, 9.)
